summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Flow-Forge automation platform - Backend APIs, Frontend UI, and Integration flows all working correctly
passed_tests: ✅ Landing page loads with hero, features, templates, pricing, integrations, CTA sections
✅ Register page creates account with name, email, password
✅ Login page authenticates with registered credentials
✅ Onboarding flow - job title and industry selection works
✅ Dashboard loads with stats cards (Active Flows, Tasks Run, Time Saved)
✅ AI Assistant accepts natural language queries and creates automations
✅ Template gallery displays 12 pre-built automation templates
✅ Automation toggle on/off functionality working
✅ Automation delete functionality working
✅ Navigation between Dashboard, Builder, Activity pages working
✅ User dropdown menu with Settings, Activity, Logout options working
✅ API /health returns ok status
✅ API /templates returns 12 template objects
✅ API /auth/register creates new users properly
✅ API /auth/login authenticates users with JWT tokens
✅ All authenticated endpoints working with proper authorization
✅ Dashboard stats API returns correct automation metrics
✅ AI suggestion API using Gemini 3 Flash integration working
✅ Activity log API tracking user actions properly
✅ Automation CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) all functional

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor timeout in builder guided tab, but core functionality works)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (full user flows from registration to automation creation working)
